summary: Daenerys wearing red and black would be too hot, the level of hotness that even the night king and his army would be like okay,...
question: Daenerys wearing red and black would be too hot, the level of hotness that even the night king and his army would be like okay, sorry, we are returning behind the wall now, you look amazing girl, we can't kill you or any other human if they can create such an amazing woman
answer:
Bahahahahaha I actually kind of love that. 

I do like how in the promo shots we see all the women in their house colors (Cersei in red and gold, Sansa in blue, Dany in black with red accents) but they are muted and kind of blah. I want to see the true colors before the end of the season, it would be so cool.

summary: I really hope we will get to see Dany in the blood red/midnight black colors of her house. I like that she’s wearing those...
body: I really hope we will get to see Dany in the blood red/midnight black colors of her house. I like that she’s wearing those colors later on but they are muted and kind of bla, I want to see the real shit. I have been waiting for that since season 3, please give her her Targ colors. This is the season of callbacks right?

always a slut for:
ava sharpe, clint barton, arya stark, lexa, marceline

Living that depression/anxiety life

tags: l i s t e n
arya mask slipping like WHAT the FRICK does that mean. sansa thinking WHAT the FRICK does that mean in an entirely different way
jon who was taking the moment to take in his family and then realizing that he could finally for sure put a face to his mother
any implications fly over his head. theres a slight awkwardness but introductions continue and continue and things move on
over the coming days dany enjoys watching arya train. jon is just happy that she seems to like his family (his favourite sister).
sansa watches dany watching arya. shes suspicious because this woman has charmed jon and now she's got arya in her sight (jon confessed)
and arya the fool is falling for it like she was the one who loved songs and stories all along
(she always did) sansa realizes. just different songs and different stories. stories of dragons and warrier princesses & targaryens
protective!sansa who's determined not to loose her little sister again. oblivious!jon who has other things LIKE A WAR to worry about
confused&smitten!arya who is learning how to feel again and boy oh boy is it a kick. and daenerys who is just like oh hello i want this one
title: listen
body:
Dany and co at Winterfell, meeting the Starks
Someone, I know barristan is dead in show but hush, maybe: *staring at arya*
daenerys: *coughs* ser?
them: my apologies your grace, my lady, I just… you are the very picture of your aunt, my lady, I apologise for staring, if I did not know better…
daenerys: so this is the face my brother started a war, and died, for?
everyone: *silence* arya is struggling not to make a face
daenerys, with a slight smile: i suppose i understand now

summary: Game of Thrones Season 8 Trailer Breakdown and Analysis
title: Game of Thrones Season 8 Trailer Breakdown and Analysis
excerpt: We breakdown all the clues and hidden conflicts buried by the White Walkers' approach in the Game of Thrones Season 8 trailer.
description: Winter is here. At last. While about a month ago, folks in Punxsutawney might have bent the knee before a large rodent in hopes of a dream of spring, for the Westerosi faithful, it has been a much longer and grueling season of darkness as we’ve waited nearly two years for Game of Thrones Season 8. Yet that time is finally upon us, and the flagship series of HBO has returned for its final season. For months, fans have eagerly waited for scraps of footage and any teaser that actually teased sequences we’d see in the final six episodes. Now, with barely a month to go before Game of Thrones’ April release date, the first real trailer has dropped… [Read More]

summary: I think it's a shame Dany wears her white coat and Sansa her leather dress with a belt. They both should be in practical...
body: I think it’s a shame Dany wears her white coat and Sansa her leather dress with a belt. They both should be in practical clothes, bulky and warm. The design is just not my favorite.

blog.name: maisiestyle
blog.title: Maisie Williams | Arya Stark | Styles & Musings

summary: Arya's weapons in S8 so far: her iconic sword Needle, a Dragonbone Valyrian dagger, a new Dragonglass staff/spear and dagger!!!...
caption:
Arya’s weapons in S8 so far: her iconic sword Needle, a Dragonbone Valyrian dagger, a new Dragonglass staff/spear and dagger!!! She is killing somethingthat bleeds in the last clip surroyndes by fire. Do wights bleed?

We see Jon running into the crypts, he looks angry and desperate…. escape route? The tunnels below are possibly the only way out of Winterfell.

We know in ep2, Jon will be in the crypts when the horn is blown that an attack on Winterfell is about happen.

Winterfell will be attacked by two forces: Cersei’s army the Golden Company which we see her meeting the leader Ser Harry Strickland and Euron. Then comes the Night King and his army of dead.

summary: Dany is make or break for s8!
body:
Dany is make or break for s8!

If Daenerys dies, I’m gonna call the show a failure. You have this huge growth over 8 seasons, from being a puppet to the most powerful in the world. Through failures and growth, betrayal and the loss of her son, finding her last surviving family member, a chance at the obe thing she’s wanted since s1e1, a home and she’s gonna die at the end?? Would be for nothing else but for the show to be edgelords and ‘unexpected’. I remember thinking by the third episode that she was the real deal in the story, even with Ned, Tyrion, Cersei and Jon, she’s the one the story revolves around.
